Column.Name: Row
Column.Description: The horizontal row of spots is the row

Column.Name: Col
Column.Description: The vertical row of spots is the column

Column.Name: chr_coord
Column.Description: This provides the coordinates of the genes on the genome

Sample.Title: biofilm, cra mutant, rep 1

Channel.Organism: Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: The cells were scraped off the plate after incubation was complete. 500 μl RNAlater (Ambion) was added to stabilize RNA, and stored at 4°C till further processing.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: E. coli MG1655 wild type and cra mutant cells were cultured for 48 hours at 26 degC on colony-forming antigen (CFA) agar plates.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy Minikit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: Samples were labelled using the Agilent Low Input RNA amplification kit (Agilent, Cat# 5184-3523), and purified using RNeasy mini kit (Qiagen).

Channel.Organism: Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: The cells were scraped off the plate after incubation was complete. 500 μl RNAlater (Ambion) was added to stabilize RNA, and stored at 4°C till further processing.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: E. coli MG1655 wild type and cra mutant cells were cultured for 48 hours at 26 degC on colony-forming antigen (CFA) agar plates.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy Minikit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: Samples were labelled using the Agilent Low Input RNA amplification kit (Agilent, Cat# 5184-3523), and purified using RNeasy mini kit (Qiagen).

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Hybridization was done using Agilent’s in-situ hybridization kit (5184-3568).
Sample.Description: cra deletion mutant vs. wild type
Sample.Data-Processing: Data from the images was extracted using Feature Extraction software of Agilent. Data was normalized using intensity-dependent (Lowess) normalization.

Channel.Growth-Protocol: E. coli MG1655 wild type and cra mutant cells were cultured for 48 hours at 26 degC on colony-forming antigen (CFA) agar plates.

Series.Title: Effect of deletion of cra on E. coli biofilm formation
Series.Summary: Transcriptional analysis of biofilm wild-type and cra mutant E. coli cells was carried out to determine the effect of cra on biofilm formation.
Series.Overall-Design: Samples were prepared in duplicates, with one of the replicates being dye swapped.
